name: Reap of cottonwood: yardman sim
description:
Play as school yardman and destroy every evil cottonwood on your way!

Game made using Godot engine for the [Godot Engine Russia] Summer week Jam.01

Features
  • Brand new gameplay style! (destroy, farm and reap!)
  • Cool retro graphics
  • Endless gameplay (well, technically)
  • 5 weapons with unique game mechanics
  • So many bosses! (boss copies = many bosses, right?)
  • Fully functional RPG system (moveSpeed and atckSpeed stats)

Feel free to leave comments! Tell me your score)

Controls
  • Move using [WASD]
  • Aim - [arrow keys]
  • change tool [1,2,3]
  • buy upgrade in the shop [space]
  • restart [R]
  • you can use controller too

tip: gather small red crops to gain xp and upgrade

Game by Gamet (https://gamet.itch.io/reap-of-cottonwood) yeah this link is so useful
Music by Vbuh  (https://vbuh.newgrounds.com)
